name: edition-tirol-shop
description: Edition Tirol Shop Theme for WooCommerce
author: Markus Reiter

scripts.preinstall: type grunt &>/dev/null || npm -g update && npm -g install grunt-cli; type bundle &>/dev/null || gem update --system && gem install bundler
scripts.postinstall: npm update caniuse-db; rm -r fonts/font-awesome && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ fonts/font-awesome/
